name: chilled-sad-discord-bot
description: A Discord Bot written in Node.js

scripts.pm2dev: pm2 start shard.js --name DEV__Mittelbot__DEV  && pm2 logs
scripts.pm2devrestart: pm2 stop DEV__Mittelbot__DEV && pm2 start shard.js --name DEV__Mittelbot__DEV  && pm2 logs
scripts.pm2: pm2 start shard.js --watch --name Mittelbot  && pm2 logs
scripts.pm2prod: pm2 start shard.js --name Mittelbot  && pm2 logs
scripts.pm2restart: pm2 stop Mittelbot && pm2 delete Mittelbot && pm2 start shard.js --watch --name Mittelbot  && pm2 logs
scripts.pm2restartprod: pm2 stop Mittelbot && pm2 delete Mittelbot && pm2 start shard.js --name Mittelbot  && pm2 logs
scripts.kill: pm2 stop Mittelbot && pm2 delete Mittelbot

author: BlackDayz
